metadata.feature_description: Allows users to subscribe to files and folders for notifications on changes

steps.action: Navigate to Assets panel and open My Website folder
steps.expected: Assets panel shows folders and files
steps.actual: Assets panel displayed with folders (Badges, Groups, Images, etc.) and files

steps.action: Hover over Images folder and click edit button to open folder details
steps.expected: Folder details panel opens with Subscribe option visible
steps.actual: Folder details panel opened showing Subscribe toggle set to 'Off', along with folder metadata, name, workflow, and versioning options

steps.action: Click Subscribe toggle to turn it On
steps.expected: Subscribe toggle changes to On state

steps.action: Click Save button to save the subscription
steps.expected: Subscription is saved and panel closes

steps.action: Re-open folder details for Images folder after saving subscription
steps.actual: Subscribe toggle correctly shows 'On' after re-opening folder details, confirming subscription persisted

steps.action: Click Subscribe toggle to turn it Off in folder details
steps.expected: Subscribe toggle changes to Off state

steps.action: Click Save button to save the unsubscription
steps.expected: Unsubscription is saved and panel closes

steps.action: Hover over test_image.png file and click edit button to open file details
steps.expected: File details panel opens with Subscribe option visible
steps.actual: File details panel opened showing Subscribe toggle set to 'Off', along with file metadata (Created, Type, Size, URL), Name, Description, Title, Tags, and various file attribute toggles

steps.action: Click Subscribe toggle to turn it On
steps.expected: Subscribe toggle changes to On state

steps.action: Click Save button to save the subscription
steps.expected: Subscription is saved and panel closes

steps.action: Re-open file details for test_image.png after saving subscription
steps.actual: Subscribe toggle correctly shows 'On' after re-opening file details, confirming subscription persisted

steps.action: Click Subscribe toggle to turn it Off in file details
steps.expected: Subscribe toggle changes to Off state

steps.action: Click Save button to save the unsubscription
steps.expected: Unsubscription is saved and panel closes

observations: The Subscribe toggle is available in both folder and file details panels, accessible via the edit button that appears on hover over items
Code review confirms subscription functionality uses DotNetNuke's Social Subscriptions system (SubscriptionController.cs) for managing file and folder subscriptions
The API endpoints for subscription are POST /API/personaBar/Assets/Subscribe and POST /API/personaBar/Assets/Unsubscribe with parameters {ItemId, IsFolder}

Subscription notifications scenario could not be fully verified as it requires actual file/folder changes to trigger notifications, which is beyond the scope of UI testing for subscription toggle functionality
The feature integrates with the DNN notification system for alerting users about changes to subscribed files and folders
